page.title: 10NORTH RONALDSAY SCHOOL
page.content: N. RONALDSAY SCHOOL This is a one-teacher school. The large classroom has a partition which used to divide the area into two. Now it is a bright open-plan classroom. The 12 children come from all over the island. In summer it is possible to cycle but in the winter everyone isbrought by car. We have lots of modern equipment including a photocopier and a computer..Our project books come from the library in Kirkwall by boat. Our techer Mrs Gordon, teaches P1-P7 and visiting specialists teach music,art and P.E. Our cook makes our dinner each day and serves our milk and fruit at play-time. The janitor cleans the school and puts on the heaters before schools starts at 9 o'clock.
